means: 使（精神）错乱(derange的过去分词和过去式)

sentence.Network_en: It's guaranteed that my colleagues think I'm deranged.
sentence.Network_cn: 同事们一定以为我疯了。

sentence.Network_en: Traffic was stopped by a deranged man shouting at the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名狂叫的疯子阻塞了交通.

sentence.Network_en: A deranged man shot and killed 14 people.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个精神失常的男子开枪打死了14人。

entry.tran: 精神错乱的;发狂的;发癫的
entry.def: Someone who is deranged behaves in a wild and uncontrolled way, often as a result of mental illness.

example.ex: A deranged man shot and killed 14 people.
example.tran: 一个精神失常的男子开枪打死了 14 人。

auth_sentence.content: A deranged virago who was famous for yelling angry obscenities.
auth_sentence.res_content: A deranged virago who was famous for yelling angry obscenities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A deranged virago who was famous for yelling angry obscenities.

auth_sentence.content: This letter deranged all the projects of James.

auth_sentence.content: Deranged and distracted by grief, he has produced this.

stems_affixes.word_buile: derange[v.使错乱,扰乱,使精神错乱,使发狂]+ed表形容词→adj.疯狂的
arrange[v.安排]+ment表名词→n.整理,排列;安排

stems_affixes.value_cn: 范围,领域;排列,连续;[山]脉
stems_affixes.word_buile: range排列,顺序→n.范围,领域;排列,连续;[山]脉v.排列成行

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使错乱,扰乱,使精神错乱,使发狂
stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+range排列,顺序→排列坏了→扰乱
mis坏,不好+arrange[v.安排]→v.排错,作不适当的安排
range排列,顺序→n.范围,领域;排列,连续;[山]脉v.排列成行

means.word_mean: 疯狂的, 神经错乱的
